trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> objects which persist in a Windows Address Book.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> objetos que são mantidas no livro de endereços do Windows.

trans-unit.source: This class has no public constructors, since a reference to it is returned by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe tem não foram construtores públicos, uma vez que uma referência ao mesmo é devolvida pela <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>classe.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>

trans-unit.source: Address books that are associated with <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> management include those associated with the host peer and a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Endereço books que estão associados <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>Gestão incluem os associadas com o elemento de rede do anfitrião e um elemento da rede remoto.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: Either computer may collaborate with other peers; when a peer is local to the remote peer but not the host peer, it can be added to the ContactManager of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: Ambos os computadores podem colaborar com outros elementos de rede; Quando um elemento de rede local para o elemento de rede remoto, mas não o elemento de rede do anfitrião, que pode ser adicionado à ContactManager do elemento de rede do anfitrião.

trans-unit.source: Certain operations on the ContactManager class, such as <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.AddContact%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact%2A>, correlate to the associated operations being performed on the Windows Address book of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Classe de determinadas operações na ContactManager, tais como <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.AddContact%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact%2A>, correlacionar as operações de associados a ser efetuada no livro de endereços do Windows do elemento de rede remoto.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.DeleteContact%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.AddContact%2A>

trans-unit.source: The host peer has access to this persistent storage for <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> information, which can be associated with the applications in which a peer intends to participate.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de rede do anfitrião tem acesso a este armazenamento persistente para <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>informações, o que podem ser associadas com as aplicações em que um elemento pretende participar.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> can identify itself as a user of a ContactManager persistent store on a computer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>servirá para identificar como um utilizador de um arquivo persistente ContactManager num computador.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o especificada <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> do elemento de rede local.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método requer uma <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>das <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance to add to <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> instância para adicionar a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified by peerContact already exists.
trans-unit.target: O especificado pelo peerContact já existe.

trans-unit.source: peerContact is .
trans-unit.target: peerContactis .

trans-unit.source: The specified peerContact has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Especificado peerContact foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: - The specified by peerContact could not be reconstituted from its serialized XML format.
trans-unit.target: -O especificado pelo peerContact não foi possível reconstituted do respetivo formato serializado de XML.

trans-unit.source: - Unable to add the local peer to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> instance being constructed.
trans-unit.target: -Não é possível adicionar o elemento de rede local para o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> instância a ser construída.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado sempre que um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> associados a um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: This method only returns applications published by contacts of the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve apenas aplicações publicadas pelo contactos de chamar o elemento da rede.

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Antes deste evento pode ser gerado, o utilizador atual do elemento de rede remoto tem de subscrever os eventos de colaboração do elemento de rede remoto.

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Subscrição é efetuada através de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Este evento requer um <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>de <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto chamado foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> instância especificado para <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método requer uma <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>das <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to associate with the new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> para associar o novo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> instância especificado para <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: peerNearMeis .

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isto <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: - The contact manager of the remote peer passed in peerNearMe could not be reached, or the contact could not be read from it.
trans-unit.target: -O Gestor de contacto do elemento remoto de transmitido peerNearMe não está acessível, ou não foi possível ler o contacto do mesmo.

trans-unit.source: - The instance passed in peerNearMe has no endpoints set on it.
trans-unit.target: -O instância transmitido peerNearMe não tem pontos finais definido nela.

trans-unit.source: Creates a contact instance for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância de contacto para especificada <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método requer uma <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>das <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> to associate with the new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> para associar o novo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined <xref:System.Object> that contains information about the CreateContactAsync operation.
trans-unit.target: Um definido pelo utilizador <xref:System.Object>que contém informações sobre a operação de CreateContactAsync.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: It will be passed to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Serão transmitida para a chamada de retorno da operação assíncrona para fins de identificação.

trans-unit.source: userToken already exists and is in use.
trans-unit.target: userTokenjá existe e está a ser utilizado.

trans-unit.target: peerNearMeis .

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: - The specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> instance has no endpoints set on it.
trans-unit.target: -Especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> instância não tem pontos finais definido nela.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact*> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado sempre que um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact*>método foi concluída.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync%2A> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado quando o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync%2A>método foi concluída.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContactAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is also raised if the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> operation completes in error or is cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Também é gerado se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>operação é concluída no erro ou foi cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Este evento requer um <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>de <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"></xref> that contains all contacts within the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"> </xref> que contém todos os contactos dentro de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> do elemento da rede remoto.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método requer uma <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>das <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"></xref> that contains all contacts within the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> of the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContactCollection"></xref>que contém todos os contactos dentro de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> do elemento da rede remoto.

trans-unit.source: If the contact manager is empty, then a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o Gestor de contacto estiver vazio, em seguida, uma coleção de tamanho zero (0) é devolvido.

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isto <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> in this peer contact collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inválido foi devolvido quando este método tentou enumerar uma <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> neste elemento contacte coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> representing the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> que representa o elemento de rede local.

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que especificado, o valor predefinido para esta propriedade é `null`.

trans-unit.source: Using this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Com esta propriedade requer um <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>de <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> instância que representa o elemento de rede local.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*> associated with a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado sempre que o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>associados a um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> foi alterada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: The associated callback provides a reference to the new <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A chamada de retorno associada fornece uma referência à nova <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Este evento requer um <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>de <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto chamado foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever an object within a contact’s registered <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> objects has changed.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado sempre que um objeto dentro de um contacto do registado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> objetos foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: Antes deste evento pode ser gerado, o utilizador atual do elemento de rede remoto tem de subscrever os eventos de colaboração do elemento de rede do anfitrião.

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the PeerContact <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Subscrição é efetuada através de PeerContact <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Este evento requer um <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>de <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Raised whenever the presence status of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado sempre que o estado de presença de um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> no <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be raised, the current user of the remote peer must subscribe to the collaboration events of the host peer.
trans-unit.target: Antes deste evento pode ser gerado, o utilizador atual do elemento de rede remoto tem de subscrever os eventos de colaboração do elemento de rede do anfitrião.

trans-unit.source: Subscription is accomplished via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Subscrição é efetuada através de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Este evento requer um <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>de <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the list of subscribed contacts changes.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando a lista de contactos subscritos é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Since subscriptions are per user and not per process or per application domain, another application running on the host may also cause this event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez que as subscrições são por utilizador e não por processo ou por domínio de aplicação, outra aplicação em execução no anfitrião poderá também fazer com que este evento para ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: This event requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Este evento requer um <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>de <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando este valor da propriedade está definida, todos os eventos não desencadeados como resultado de uma operação assíncrona terão os processadores do evento associado novamente chamados num thread que criou especificada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>

trans-unit.source: The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: O valor de conjunto predefinido para esta propriedade é `null`, que indica que todos os processadores de eventos são chamados num thread de conjunto de threads de sistema.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set to a UI element such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> instance.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade normalmente, é definida para um elemento de IU como uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>instância.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: Object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"> </xref> interface e é utilizado por instâncias deste tipo de sincronização de processador de eventos no thread que o criou.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto chamado foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Updates the data associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os dados associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método requer uma <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>das <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> to be updated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> ser atualizados.

trans-unit.source: - <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> not found in <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>Não foi encontrado no <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: peerContactis .

trans-unit.target: Isto <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> objeto foi eliminado.

trans-unit.source: Unable to complete UpdateContact operation.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível concluir a operação de UpdateContact.
